meanings.definition: The plural form of oestrus, the period of sexual receptivity in female mammals.
meanings.sent1: During oestruses, female animals are ready to mate.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper noted the oestruses of the lions in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The oestruses of the cows made the farm quite lively.
meanings.sent4: In the wild, the oestruses of the deer attract many suitors.
meanings.sent5: The veterinarian explained the importance of monitoring oestruses in pets.

meanings.definition: The plural form of oestrus, the state of being in heat or estrus.
meanings.sent1: Farmers pay attention to the oestruses of their livestock for breeding purposes.
meanings.sent2: The oestruses of the female dogs were causing quite a commotion in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The oestruses of the cats seemed to coincide with the full moon.
meanings.sent4: The oestruses of the elephants could be felt throughout the savannah.
meanings.sent5: The researchers studied the hormonal changes during oestruses in various species.
